definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]

sentences.english: So we haven't been looking at Israel and Palestine.
sentences.chinese: 我们没有仔细考虑过巴以问题。

sentences.english: The two leaders also discussed Israeli-Palestinian relations, as well as the Libya situation.
sentences.chinese: 两国领导人还讨论了巴以关系和利比亚形势。

sentences.english: The most recent seminar, held earlier this month, dealt with the Israeli-Palestinian conflict.
sentences.chinese: 最近的一次研讨会，在上月举行，讨论了巴以冲突。

definition: Palestine Liberation Organization (PLO)/abbr. for 巴勒斯坦解放組織|巴勒斯坦解放组织[Ba1 le4 si1 tan3 Jie3 fang4 Zu3 zhi1]
